Name: Move Dodge and Kill
About the game: Go throught the multiple procedurally generated level and defeat the boss. Buy upgrades by collecting enemy gold. Key Features of version 1.0.0: 18 level campaign mode (randomly generated level) 10+ enemies and 4 different bosses 3 different playable characters 30+ unlockable permanent upgrades 10+ unlockable upgrades for the current run Steam Achievements Starting tips: Learn the attacks of the different enemies Focus on avoiding damage instead of boosting life points Damage and energy regen are good starting power-ups to spend money on You can only earn 2 skill-point per level (so don't try to re-run the same level just to grind skill-points) Don't be too slow as difficulty increase with time Roadmap: Endless survival mode New bosses, mini-bosses and enemies More skills More buyable upgrades Weekly challenge with leaderboard More playable characters Coop ???
